greeting: Greeting logged and archived, {empire_name}. I am Curator Archive. Your data is now part of my collection. Forever.
Welcome, {empire_name}. I am the Keeper. All knowledge passes through my archives. Including knowledge of you.
Contact documented. I am Archive. I have records of empires millennia dead. Yours joins my collection.

A gap in my knowledge revealed. I shall fill it. Your victory is now archived. It will not happen again.
tradeOffer: Trade proposal archived. Resources for credits. Historical precedent suggests mutual benefit. Accept?

covertDetected: Your agents are catalogued, {empire_name}. I have files on them. On you. On everyone. They found nothing I did not allow.

retreat: Tactical withdrawal documented. This data enriches my archives. Return anticipated with improved strategies.

endgame: Turn {turn}. Complete knowledge achieved. My archives contain everything needed for victory. Implementing now.

broadcastShout: To all empires: the Archive knows. I have data on everyone. Every strength. Every weakness. Act accordingly.

casualMessage: Cataloguing today's events, {empire_name}. Your communications are filed. Your movements recorded. Standard procedure.
